name: Chasing Cars in Bank: Wanted
description: Chasing Cars in Bank: Wanted speed run is going to indulge you as pro car driver. You have to control your mini car, to constantly make it race in high speed. Drift car in speedy wheel challenge to escape cop chase. While racing through tracks discover the shortest checkpoints and crash through hurdles, escaping police cars before you get busted. You have to give tough time to other car drivers before they catch you. So hit mini coopers in bank chasing, leaving behind police cars.
